revisionDesc.change: Added nine new scholarly sources on Eaton to the bibliography.
Removing all WEA bibliography entries and embedding them into their own files using utilities/msdesc_main.xsl
Removing LondonTown and ToPoets per SH1
added four MS instalments of Movie Madness.
added four entries from Ferens and Birchall bibliographies
Changed date for Cant Run Away
Added date for Movie Madness ms.
Changed page number for First Appearance.
added additional entry of Other People.
changing links of secondary bibl entries.
added illustrators and identified anonymous texts.
tried to demarcate different parts of serial.
added 3 new bibl entries and generated ids.
changed additional dates re Shaun Hunter ideas.
changed dates re Shaun Hunter ideas.
Added page info for Other Peoples Troubles.
Added bibl ids and some automatic tagging through XSLT.
